pageContext.claim: “Under my plan, 33 million Medicare beneficiaries will soon receive a card in the mail containing $200 that they can use to help pay for prescription drugs. Nobody has seen this before. These cards are incredible. The cards will be mailed out in coming weeks.”
pageContext.analysis: Despite Trump's frequent promises, the $200 Medicare cards were never delivered before the election -- and simply seemed to fade from public mention after the election. After Trump lost the election, officials confirmed they would not be issued.
